thread.title: For the Record with Greta on MSNBC

title: For the Record with Greta on MSNBC

organizations.name: u.s. army major general bob scales

text: Greta: Remembering Slain Officer Keith Boyer 02/21/17 06:58PM ‘For The Record’ Commentary 2/21/17: Greta Van Susteren shares the story of a California police officer who was gunned down while responding to a traffic accident. watch Burns: McMaster Shouldn’t Have to Contend With Bannon 02/21/17 06:29PM Former Ambassador to NATO Nicholas Burns tells Greta Van Susteren that rival power centers in the White House will be “disastrous” for foreign policy. watch Divided America in the Age of Trump 02/21/17 06:07PM Former Sen. Byron Dorgan (D-ND) and former Sen. Jim DeMint (R-SC) join Greta Van Susteren to discuss the tough town hall crowds many lawmakers are facing back in their home districts. watch Greta: My Message to President Trump and the Press 02/20/17 06:58PM ‘For The Record’ Commentary 2/20/17: Greta Van Susteren weighs in on the feud between the media and President Trump. watch Swalwell: Many GOP ‘Putting Party Ahead of Country’ 02/20/17 06:23PM Rep. Eric Swalwell (D-CA) tells Greta Van Susteren that more Republicans need to “get on board” with the idea of an independent bipartisan commission to investigate Russian hacking. watch Scales: Trump Has Best National Security Team Since Eisenhower 02/20/17 06:03PM Retired U.S. Army Major General Bob Scales tells Greta Van Susteren that H.R. McMaster is an “agent of transformation” in the Department of Defense. watch Watch: Greta’s full interview with Israeli PM Netanyahu 02/17/17 06:49PM Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu tells MSNBC’S Greta Van Susteren how he sees the Arab world changing and shares his candid thoughts on the Trump administration. watch Burgess: Lack of Bipartisan Effort Sank Obamacare 02/17/17 06:29PM Rep. Michael Burgess (R-TX) joins Greta Van Susteren to discuss the GOP’s plan to repeal and replace Obamacare. watch Frum: Trump’s ‘Enemy’ Press Tweet ‘Incitement to Vigilante... 02/17/17 06:08PM The Atlantic’s David Frum and presidential historian Jon Meacham reflect on the fourth week of Donald Trump’s presidency. watch Greta: A Secret Act of Kindness For a Woman of Courage 02/16/17 06:57PM ‘For The Record’ Commentary 2/16/17: Greta Van Susteren shares the incredible connection between civil rights icon Rosa Parks and Little Caesars Pizza founder Mike Ilitch. watch
